start.title: Instructions
start.text:
Please read the following instructions carefully. This experiment will last about 30 minutes, and you'll receive $2.00 for participating. Please do not write anything down, do not click the back button on your browser, and do not open other tabs or browsers during the experiment.

In this experiment, you will studying and recalling the location of countries on a map of Africa.

A country on the map of Africa will be highlighted and you will be asked to select a button that has the name of the corresponding country. After each trial, you will be told the correct answer.

You will do this task until all locations have been presented 4 times. There will be 24 countries that you will be scored on.


Thank you for participating! Click Continue when you are ready to begin.

map-task.title: Africa Map Task
map-task.text:
In this part of the experiment, you will be presented with a map of Africa on the left side of the screen and a list of countries on the right side of the screen. For each trial, a country will be highlighted on the map and you will select the corresponding button on the right side of the screen.


Click 'Continue' when you are ready to begin.

posttest.title: Instructions
posttest.text:
You will now take a test on the countries that you studied earlier. You will no longer receive feedback after each answer.

Click Begin when you are ready to begin the posttest.
